column1: Goto the parameter selection tab and select a database from the existing list of databases.
The list of available KPI from the selected database is loaded dynamicaally.
Enter the year for which the KPI data is to be considered.
Select the connectivity parameter for the graph in the same manner.
You can now view the EDA for the KPI data and the Graph data explicitely.
After which the GSP results tab is activated.
Note: To add a new database, .csv format is required.
